section.title: Converting DocBook From Version 5 into Version 4
Problem
section.para: You have a DocBook document in version 5.x, but you need 4.x.

section.title: Solution
section.para: Generally, the difference between version 4 and version 5 are minimal. Refer to the The Definitive Guide for detailed information what has been added, removed, or renamed.

Use your favorite XSLT prozessor to transform your documents.

section.title: Discussion
section.para: The usual structure can be handled fairly well by the stylesheet from . Usual means in this context, your document must be valid and no new DocBook 5 elements are used. New elements can not be handled correctly as there are no direct mappings available. In such cases it is better to customize the mentioned stylesheet to your needs.
